name: THE GAME OF THE GAMES [Complete Edition]
name_original: THE GAME OF THE GAMES [Complete Edition]
description:
You are a guy who wants to play a game. Do you want to play a game? You will play a game. In this game, you will play a game. As a guy trying to play a game. And maybe kill or die trying to do it.

Complete  version of a game that i made for a game jam. Some ideias were cut for make it in time for the jam so that's the version as originally intended! 

Features:

* A lot of puzzle-like choices (and one actual more normal puzzle).

* 3 characters that can all die if you make the wrong (or right?) choices...

* 3 Routes, one almost entirely different from the other two.

* 4 Endings (Excluding the several endings where you just die for not paying enough attention, dumbass)

* A messy manga-like artstyle.

Also, if you really enjoyed the game, consider supporting me on Ko-fi! 

https://ko-fi.com/l0wrens0

Or just leave a comment!

[I still have some ideias for maybe a extended/alternative version with a new character  and more puzzles and endings but i wanted to make it short as originally planned for now]
